ValidationRule.description: If Activity->Change Term is selected, Require Term. OLD #, Term. NEW #
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Activity__c , "Change Term"), OR( OLD_Terminating__c = "", NEW_Terminating__c = ""), RecordType.Name = "Toll Free" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the activity is "Change Term", you must enter an OLD and NEW Terminating Number
